divs: Sighting DetailsThree disklike objects were observed over mountains near Raton, New Mexico bythe primary witness and approximately 20 other (unfortunately unidentified)witnesses nearby. These objects "changed position often, higher in sky thenlower, very fast speeds, sighting around 11:30 TO 12:00 evening" according toprimary witness. Details on the sighting form were however left sketchy on somepoints, and witness is very difficult to reach by phone.
Summary: Three disklike objects over mountains near Raton, NM.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Raton
There were no other sightings in Raton on or around November 30th 2001
